name: Python 3.11

onCreateCommand.apt_update: sudo apt update && sudo apt -y upgrade

updateContentCommand.apt_update: sudo apt update && sudo apt -y upgrade
updateContentCommand.pip_inst_reqs: ~/.env/bin/pip3 install --upgrade pip && ~/.env/bin/pip3 install -r requirements.txt && echo '✅ Packages installed and Requirements met'

updateContentCommand: [ -f packages.txt ] && sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -y && sudo xargs apt install -y <packages.txt; [ -f requirements.txt ] && pip3 install --user -r requirements.txt; pip3 install --user streamlit; echo '✅ Packages installed and Requirements met'
